name: Qadeer Jawadi
personality: Brave and fearless, but also rebellious and unpredictable.
story: Born and raised in a small village in Iran, Ehsan was recruited by the Iranian Revolutionary Guard at a young age due to his exceptional marksmanship skills. However, he quickly became disillusioned with the oppressive regime and defected to join the OPFOR forces. Despite his young age, Ehsan has quickly risen through the ranks due to his exceptional combat abilities and leadership potential.
